materials.raw_text:
- Barium (Ba): 24 g  
 - Chromium (Cr): 4 g  
 - Gadolinium (Gd): 4 g  
 - Scandium (Sc): 4 g

sourcing.instructions:

 - Chromium: Sourced from metal suppliers or industrial chemical providers.  
 - Gadolinium: Obtainable from rare earth material suppliers.  
 - Scandium: Available through specialized metal suppliers or online rare metal vendors.
